title: Informal Learning-Based Capacity Development Program for Science Field Managers

context.prior_knowledge: Intermediate-level science expertise and practical experience, foundational understanding of scientific methodology (hypothesis formulation, variable control, experimental design)
context.additional_context: A blended approach combining non-formal and formal learning to enhance the professional competencies of practicing science professionals. A specialized competency development program for science managers, focusing on integrating scientific inquiry processes into administrative tasks.

learning_goals: Enhancing â‰¥3 managerial competencies (self-management, team leadership, scientific decision-making) using informal learning methods (mentoring, ad-hoc tasks, etc.).
Utilize collaborative tools within the LMS to share experiences with peer learners at least once a week, developing practical problem-solving skills by applying scientific inquiry methods.

After completing a 4-week virtual stretch assignment (challenging task), learners must propose two innovative solutions applicable to real scientific work environments (e.g., manufacturing/service sites), achieving an average of 4 or higher on a 5-point scale from peer/instructor feedback. The solution development must include experimental design and data analysis processes.
difficulty: Hard - Complex requirements with multiple constraints
